Careers at Aganitha

change this: Join the team that’s transforming the future of human health. Grow your career in a dynamic, inclusive environment filled with talented professionals dedicated to driving the leading edge of scientific discovery.

Who we are

We are a team of IIT alums, with published papers, books, patents and experience in research. Industry veterans with prior experience of successful startups, managed thousands of employees, hundreds of million dollars of revenue, worked with fortune 500 companies.

We build solutions that can fit in an enterprise, from standards, security, manageability, extendibility, and maintainability perspectives.We are a company and a team that combines modern technologies with enterprise IT best practices to help biotechnology companies in the entire drug life cycle

Why Aganitha?

  • A challenging and stimulating environment and a chance to work on some of the cutting edge technology
  • Complete ownership of problem to help understand big picture and prepare for bigger roles
  • Emphasis on learning on the job with frequent sharing sessions
  • A chance to for our developers to learn basics of all technologies and specialization in a few.
  • Several of our employees from earlier start-ups are now industry stalwarts: a CVP at Microsoft, early employees of companies like Google, and Amazon.

We are looking for

  • Ability and curiosity to learn new topics- In the ever evolving world of biopharma and disruptive technology we expect you to proactively keep abreast of new developments in the relevant fields
  • Ability to communicate well- All our work is fast moving and built collaboratively requiring clear and constant communication
  • Quality Conscious- Conscious approach towards quality output and development of systems that are easy to use and understand for other colleagues and end users
  • Ability to deliver and close- Approach to bring clarity and proper planning to meet the deadlines is a highly appreciated quality

“What attracted me and continues to excite me is the way we at Aganitha mix Computing, AI, Biology, and Chemistry to solve meaningful, long standing drug discovery problems that will help save lives and make a mark in the BioPharma industry. Another feature here that is a sight to watch - seasoned professionals with over 3 decades of experience in the IT industry working hands-on and collaboratively with young millennials”

Chanukya Nanduri

Business Solutions Analyst
